overview: The cast of this Canadian-produced special (originally aired over the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation on Sunday, October 26th 1980) included Peter Cullen as The Wolf Man, Jack Duffy as Dr. Frankenstein, Ben Gordon as Dracula, Barbara Law as The Countess and Ted Zeigler as the Frankenstein monster, with special guests Dionne Warwick and Rip Taylor.
title: Boo!
